articles.title: Outbreak Brief 7: Monkeypox in Africa Union Member States – Africa CDC - africacdc.org
articles.description: Global Update (non-endemic countries)[1]: As of 24 August 2022, 45,535 confirmed cases of monkeypox and 110 deaths were reported from 98 countries/territories globally. The countries reporting the majority of cases are mainly in Europe and North America.[2] A…

articles.title: Here's how monkeypox turned into global public health emergency in just 4 months | Mint - Mint
articles.description: More than 45,000 monkeypox cases are scattered across 100 or more countries around the world, mostly in Europe and North America.
